title: Dishwasher, Electric Fireplace*, Dog Park, Business Center
posting_body: ['MODERN APARTMENTS IN DENVER, COLORADO', 'Welcome to life at Retreat at Water’s Edge, your destination for the studio, one, and two-bedroom apartments in Denver, Colorado.', 'Open floor plans welcome you in, and convenient community amenities compliment your lifestyle..', 'Throughout the community, indulge in upscale amenities designed to bring comfort and convenience just steps from your front door.', 'Head into downtown Denver for work or leisure, or stay closer to home to enjoy the stunning parks, exciting shopping, and delicious dining options here in the neighborhood.', 'Schedule your tour of our Denver apartments for rent with us today to find the perfect home for you.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 3', 'OR Text', '3', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more
